html:
gates…open continually. John the Revelator saw the same thing in his vision: "And the gates of it shall not be shut at all by day: for there shall be no night there" (Rev. 21:25). The practice in Jerusalem was to shut the gates at night for security, but there will be neither night nor need for security in the New Jerusalem, and thus the gates need never be shut. Through the open gates will come kings and the wealth and power of the Gentiles.

forces of the Gentiles. See commentary on 60:5.
